name: Oven SPAM® Sandwiches
author: SASSY43028
summary: These sandwiches are made with SPAM®, Velveeta®, relish, and mayonnaise. Very simple and easy, but very good.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) can fully cooked luncheon meat (such as SPAM®), cubed
¾ (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®), cubed
½ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir together the luncheon meat, processed cheese, relish, and salad dressing in a bowl
Spoon the filling into the sandwich buns, and wrap each sandwich individually in aluminum foil
Place the sandwiches onto a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until the filling is hot, and the buns have toasted, 10 to 15 minutes
